header_text: You and your partner have been dating long-distance for awhile and you're going to be living in the same place in just a few months. You’ve never lived in the same place before, and you’re not quite sure how this change could impact your relationship. Even though you feel a bit nervous, you know that this is normal.

elements.Text: Is your nervousness a sign that your relationship won't work out?
